markdownRemark.html:
ahh.. seems I originated a new law. In response to this article’s comment which states:

“Who fixes a bug by making something dependent on the dll/exe company name? Stupid…How are those outsourced indians working for you now Oracle and Sun!!!!”

I postulate thusly

**As an online discussion about PROGRAMMING grows longer, the probability of a comparison involving outsourcing or Indians approaches 1, if [Godwin’s law](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godwin’slaw) has not already been satisfied**_

It is an honest attempt at reducing the reduction ad outsourcedum arguments that seem to be getting more popular.
